Shin Ramen.Description: Combined pack of 5 shin ramen. Very authentic korean ramen flavour.

Kimchi Ramyun.Description: Lightly spicy kimchi flavour instant noodles. Authentic korean ramen.

Neoguri Ramen.Description: Oriental spicy seafood soup flavour noodles. Bevare - it is really hot.

Potato Ramen.Description: Aromatic potato flavour noodles. Suitable for vegetarians.

Sesame Ramen.Description: Unbelievably rich taste of sesame and egg. Really authentic ramen.

Soon Ramen.Description: Oriental instant noodles with vegetable flavour. Suitable for vegetarians.

Chacharoni.Description: Real black bean noodles with vegatbles and pieces of meat.

Champong Noodles.Description: Oriental spicy seafood flavour ramen. Authentic korean seafood soup taste.

Chapagetti.Description: Easy to cook black bean noodles. Traditional black bean flavour.

Yeul Ramen.Description: Yeul ramen are extremely hot. Don't even try if you can't eat spicy food.

Honey Twist.Description: Original korean twisted cracker with apple and honey flavour.

Potato Snack.Description: Yummy potato cracker with mild flavour.

Shrimp Chips.Description: Unbelievably rich taste of shrimp meat. Famous oriental cracker.
